current_role: Founder & Full Stack Developer at Hype Design
personal_brand_positioning: Tech entrepreneur and full-stack developer building high-converting web experiences, SaaS tools, and automation systems.

backstory.origin: Started as a self-taught full-stack developer with a passion for solving problems through code.
backstory.journey: Worked on diverse projects involving SaaS apps, automation, AI, and high-converting landing pages. Built Hype Design to help entrepreneurs escape low-converting websites.
milestones: Over 4 years of professional development experience
Built SaaS tools like Leadscraper for developers to generate leads
Experimenting with AI agents and automation frameworks
lessons_learned: Consistency in shipping beats waiting for perfection
Good design paired with conversion psychology multiplies results
Automation is leverage for solopreneurs and small teams

content_pillars: Personal journey of building Hype Design
Actionable tips for solopreneurs and developers
audience_resonance: Aspiring entrepreneurs, developers, and solopreneurs who want to use design, and SaaS tools to scale faster.
tone: Authentic, helpful, slightly playful, but always practical.

content_preferences.storytelling_depth: Mix of short tactical insights and occasional deeper personal stories
topics_to_avoid: Overly technical deep dives without context

goals_with_personal_brand: Build trust and authority in SaaS and web design niche
Grow audience on Twitter with valuable insights
Build a reputation as a founder-creator who shares his journey
